attributes.action: Allow doubly vaccinated to return to the UK with self/ no isolation
attributes.additional_details: The vaccine programme was sold to the public as a way to normal living. The recommended strategy will allow the government to fulfil its commitment in a risk managed manner. Moreover it would allow thousands or millions of essential workers and others,  who have not met their family abroad and are suffering from emotional and psychological stress, to feel well again.
attributes.background: Two doses of vaccine provide very high immunity against all viral strains & reduce transmission. It’s time to start living with the virus. Can the government allow all doubly vaccinated returning from Red countries to do home & Amber no isolation, with option of PCR Test before & after arrival?
